promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic epic frilled-lizard psychic-type pokemon wearing a ancient crystal headband. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptogaze, a a gigantic epic frilled-lizard psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Cosmic Burn. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "psychic" or "Cryptogaze". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Cryptogaze: A colossal, mystic, fan-necked behemoth dwelling in tomb-like chambers, harnessing Cosmic Burn to scorch foes amidst eerie shadows.
